resources.string: This app requests your location for generating dynamic iBeacon notifications
Cannot load gallery data. Ensure you have a network connection and try again.
Incorrect email address or password. Try again!
Invalid hostname. Hosts should be like http[s]://host.com:port, for example http://localhost:8080
Your device either does not support Bluetooth LE or Bluetooth is switched off. Please enable Bluetooth and try again!
